threats.title: Shai hulud npm supply-chain malware
threats.summary: Targeted compromise of popular Angular scaffolding packages distributing multi-stage payloads.

threats.title: Telegram-based credential stealers
threats.summary: Campaigns abusing Telegram Bot API endpoints from npm postinstall hooks to exfiltrate environment secrets.

threats.title: Discord webhook credential stealers
threats.summary: Commodity stealers leveraging Discord webhooks from obfuscated npm scripts.
